channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Surviving The Smear Campaign: Emil Bove Shines At Confirmation Hearing
item.description: Efforts to derail Emil Bove's nomination, whether from the left or from risk-averse elements of the right, should be firmly rejected.

item.title: Trump tariffs have earned $81.5 billion in new money, DHS says
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security has collected more than $106 billion in tariff revenue since President Trump took office, and most of that -- $81....

item.title: Josh Hawley, Friend of a Friend of the Working Man
item.description: His mistake is thinking that the way to win over working-class voters is by supporting policies favored by union leaders.

item.title: Thom Tillis Defends a Medicaid Scam
item.description: North Carolina’s senator pledges not to vote for any budget unless it allows his state to keep fleecing you.

item.title: Putting Political Litmus Tests In Your Dating App Bio Is A Red Flag
item.description: When people only want political 'discussions' that confirm their biases, they make the vulnerability that relationships require impossible.

item.title: The Supreme Court Deals a Blow to Planned Parenthood’s Medicaid Lawfare
item.description: No longer can Planned Parenthood rely on legal activism to preserve its taxpayer revenue. The responsibility now shifts to Congress to do what the sta...

item.title: Don’t count out Apple in the ‘AI race’: It might be in the best position of all
item.description: Apple has never been about speed. It just needs to integrate AI in a way that enhances the “Apple magic.”

item.title: Senate passes amendment to strip ban on AI regulations as 'big, beautiful bill' flails
item.description: The Senate early Tuesday voted to quash an effort to impose a 10-year moratorium on state regulation of artificial intelligence. The vote removed the ...

item.title: The S&P is back to record highs—proving yet again the wisdom of a buy and hold strategy
item.description: "All time highs are exciting, but expected in a growing stock market. It's like saying once per summer that my tree hit a new all-time high."

item.title: Trump says DOGE 'monster' may have to 'eat Elon' as Musk vows primary ads for lawmakers who cross him on BBB

item.title: What Does The Bible Really Say About Who The True Israel Is?
item.description: Want to stand with Israel? Great, take your stand with Jesus and His church!

item.title: Colorado Christian Camp Wins Legal Victory Against State’s Radical Transgender Rules
item.description: Camp IdRaHaJe can continue its work in alignment with its Christian stance on biological sex, but Colorado is still pushing trans ideology.

item.title: Elon Musk's attacks on Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' have 'no basis,' says No 2 House Republican
item.description: House Majority Leader Steve Scalise, R-La., spoke with Fox News Digital about President Trump's "big, beautiful bill."

item.title: I led E*Trade and now lead Yieldstreet: Here’s how to get the opening of private markets for retail investors right—with the benefit of hindsight
item.description: Retail investors have for too long been locked out of private markets—where most value creation in the economy occurs.

item.title: Trump’s Undiplomatic Diplomacy
item.description: He persuades by pressuring. He coaxes by threatening. He de-escalates by escalating.

item.title: Trump Needs A Massive Drone Fleet To Defend U.S. Interests And Deter Its Enemies
item.description: A core component of future strength will not be a dozen or even hundreds of drones ready for war. The future is hundreds of thousands.

item.title: Trump family’s Bitcoin mining company raises $220 million
item.description: President Donald Trump’s two sons, Eric and Donald Jr., are investors in American Bitcoin.

item.title: Trump slams ‘total nut job’ Mamdani for not condemning ‘globalize the intifada’ phrase
item.description: President Donald Trump bashed New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani, calling him a "communist" and a "total nut job."

item.title: Jerome Powell says Fed would have lowered rates already if it weren’t for tariffs
item.description: After the widespread uncertainty caused by the tariff policy, Powell said the Fed decided the "prudent thing to do is to wait."

item.title: Restraint Is Conservative
item.description: Skepticism of American foreign adventurism is native to the American right.

item.title: Trump signs an executive order lifting sanctions against Syria
